name: Drawing Basics
Details: Best course to learn the basics of drawing.The course is broken down into 23 videos. Each video involves about 5 to 10 minutes of work. Concepts are taught through video lectures only.
Syllabus: How to Hold and Control Your Pencil.
The Basic Elements - Shape Value Color Edge.

name: Perspective Drawing
Details: Best course to learn perspective drawing.The course is broken down into 22 videos. Each video involves about 6 to 10 minutes of work. Concepts are taught through video lectures only.

name: Drawing Nature, Science
Details: Best university course to learn to draw nature.The course is broken down into 6 weeks. Each module involves about 3 to 6 hours of work. Concepts are taught through a combination of videos.
Syllabus: The structure of flowers and leaves.
The structure of mammals and birds.

name: Digital Art Fundamentals
Details: Best course to learn to draw manga.The course is broken down into 7 videos. Each video involves about 15 to 20 minutes of work. Concepts are taught through video lectures only.
Syllabus: How to Draw Faces for Beginners.
How to Draw Eyes for Beginners.
How to Draw Anime Face PROFILE SIDE VIEW.
How to Draw Faces 3/4 View For Beginners

name: Art of Caricature
Details: Best course to learn to draw caricatures.The course is broken down into 52 videos. Each video involves about 5 to 20 minutes of work. Concepts are taught through video lectures only.

name: Realistic Drawing
Details: Best course to learn realistic portraits and objects.The course is broken down into 29 videos. Each video involves about 7 to 10 minutes of work. Concepts are taught through video lectures only.
Syllabus: How To GRID a REALISTIC PORTRAIT DRAWING!
